description:
This was taken on Jan 2nd of this year. An hour prior to this, I had just let slip to @namof my long concealed obsessive interest (and alarm) in pandemics. People who knew or cared about the high impending probability of pandemics (more likely than any natural disaster within our lifetime to catastrophically affect our world) were generally considered to be just a weird nerdy crazy bunch so Iâ€™d learned to not bring up the topic. Whelp, now weâ€™re all in it together arenâ€™t we? ðŸ¤“ My friends and I joke now that itâ€™s been very exciting for me to finally not have to hide my fervor- but honestly, it has felt somehow worse. It hasnâ€™t been fun watching the world learn facts that have BEEN out there for decades. It hasnâ€™t been fun watching our health and social systems struggle and fail and the government not support our people when the warnings have been everywhere. It hasnâ€™t been fun watching fear, ignorance, and politics win over properly actionable solutions. It hasnâ€™t been fun watching our nationâ€™s complete lack of humility and inability to LEARN. We still havenâ€™t learned. We still arenâ€™t listening. Weâ€™re still dying. 
.
.
To all the #MyBodyMyChoice #NoMasks #FreeCountry #NoMasksNeeded #Covid19Hoax #NoNewNormal #Plandemic #ExposeBillGates people: You are murderers. You are racists. You are a virus. You should die in place of everyone else that has suffered in this unnecessarily extended nightmare because of YOU.
.
.
#WEARAFUCKINGMASK #HAVESOMESELFCONTROL #DONTBEASELFISHFUCK
